group_1.textLeft: Sensei, the Magical Girls with reservations@should be arriving soon.

group_1.textCenter: You're right. We oughta start gettin' ready.
With that said, I guess that'll have to be it@for today's chat.
Y'know, somehow or another, I feel like I really@start runnin' my mouth whenever you drop by.
So I'm afraid anythin' past this point is gonna@have to stay under wraps for a while.
I can't say for sure when I'll next feel like@discussin' it...
But when that time comes, I'll let you in on the@whole thing.
Be careful on your way home now, y'hear?
Also, you oughta promise me this!
No matter how tough it gets, you oughta swear@'til you're blue in the face an' stand back up!
It's easy t' fall down. Really, it is.
Lean on whoever y' need to, throw out all your@pride-- do whatever.
But the one thing you've gotta do is make sure@t' keep facing forward.
If you don't, you just might wind up like little@old me.
